name: TRANSPORT ET LOGISTIQUE DE FRANCE
goal:
TLF est la premi?re organisation professionnelle repr?sentative de l'ensemble des m?tiers de la chaine du transport et de la logistique en France. L'Union repr?sente, promeut et d?fend les int?r?ts de l'ensemble des m?tiers de la branche. Nos principales actions:
valoriser nos m?tiers et contribution au succ?s du commerce ext?rieur de la France;
pr?server les int?r?ts de nos entreprises adh?rentes;
accompagner les entreprises dans les changements r?glementaires et technologiques.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
